item.title: LOOPING TIME
item.content:encoded:
When can I loop?

what happen with my loop quest if i got my knightmare frame after my loop time appear ?

i should do loop right now, at Gen lv.22, and my loop quest already show up. but, can i delay my loop time until at lv.29 or still at the max lv.24 ??

tq

In season 1, you can freely choose to loop any time after one of your attributes (Gen/Nin/Tai) reaches level 20. Once one of them has reached 20, it may no longer level up. This is your level cap. Each of Gen/Nin/Tai can get to 20, thus making your highest available total level 60. If you get the Knightmare Frame, each of your stats cap 5 higher. Your level cap increases by 2 each season, whereas the time you can loop increases by 1 each season.
Season Can loop Level Cap Level Cap with Knightmare Frame
Season 1 20 20 25
Season 2 21 22 27
Season 3 22 24 29
Season X 19 + X 18 + 2X 23 + 2X
